00018 class Point

00024         Point& operator+=(Point <T> q) {x+=q.x; y+=q.y; z+=q.z; return *this;}
00025         Point& operator-=(Point <T> q) {x-=q.x; y-=q.y; z-=q.z; return *this;}

00029                 this->x=q.x;

00032                 }
00033

00036         
00037         void print() {std::cout << x << " " << y << " " << z <<"\n";}
